animations.name: Rubber Band
animations.css: .rubberband { animation: rubberband 1s ease-in-out; } @keyframes rubberband { 0% { transform: scale(1); } 30% { transform: scaleX(1.25) scaleY(0.75); } 40% { transform: scaleX(0.75) scaleY(1.25); } 50% { transform: scaleX(1.15) scaleY(0.85); } 65% { transform: scaleX(0.95) scaleY(1.05); } 75% { transform: scaleX(1.05) scaleY(0.95); } 100% { transform: scale(1); } }

animations.name: Wobble
animations.css: .wobble { animation: wobble 1s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes wobble { 0% { transform: translateX(0%); } 15% { transform: translateX(-25%) rotate(-5deg); } 30% { transform: translateX(20%) rotate(3deg); } 45% { transform: translateX(-15%) rotate(-3deg); } 60% { transform: translateX(10%) rotate(2deg); } 75% { transform: translateX(-5%) rotate(-1deg); } 100% { transform: translateX(0%); } }

animations.name: Swing
animations.css: .swing { animation: swing 1s ease-in-out infinite; transform-origin: top center; } @keyframes swing { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); } 20% { transform: rotate(15deg); } 40% { transform: rotate(-10deg); } 60% { transform: rotate(5deg); } 80% { transform: rotate(-5deg); } 100% { transform: rotate(0deg); } }

animations.name: Tadaa
animations.css: .tadaa { animation: tadaa 1s ease-in-out infinite; } @keyframes tadaa { 0% { transform: scale(1); } 10%, 20% { transform: scale(0.9) rotate(-3deg); } 30%, 50%, 70% { transform: scale(1.1) rotate(3deg); } 40%, 60% { transform: scale(1.1) rotate(-3deg); } 80% { transform: scale(1) rotate(0); } 100% { transform: scale(1); } }

animations.name: Shake Horizontal
animations.css: .shake-horizontal { animation: shake-horizontal 0.5s infinite alternate; } @keyframes shake-horizontal { 0% { transform: translateX(-10px); } 100% { transform: translateX(5px); } }

animations.name: Shake Vertical
animations.css: .shake-vertical { animation: shake-vertical 0.5s infinite alternate; } @keyframes shake-vertical { 0% { transform: translateY(-10px); } 100% { transform: translateY(5px); } }

animations.name: Vibrate
animations.css: .vibrate { animation: vibrate 0.4s infinite linear; } @keyframes vibrate { 0% { transform: translateX(-5px); } 25% { transform: translateX(5px); } 50% { transform: translateX(-5px); } 75% { transform: translateX(5px); } 100% { transform: translateX(-5px); } }

animations.name: Pulsate
animations.css: .pulsate { animation: pulsate 1.5s infinite ease-in-out; } @keyframes pulsate { 0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 0.7; } 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Ping
animations.css: .ping { animation: ping 1.5s infinite ease-out; } @keyframes ping { 0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 80% { transform: scale(1.5); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1.5); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Flicker
animations.css: .flicker { animation: flicker 0.15s infinite alternate; } @keyframes flicker { 0% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0.4; } 100% { opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Flicker-slow
animations.css: .flicker-slow { animation: flicker 0.5s infinite alternate; } @keyframes flicker { 0% { opacity: 1; } 50% { opacity: 0.4; } 100% { opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Blink
animations.css: .blink { animation: blink 0.8s infinite alternate; } @keyframes blink { 0% { opacity: 1; } 100% { opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Jelly Horizontal
animations.css: .jelly-horizontal { animation: jello-horizontal 0.8s infinite ease-in-out; } @keyframes jello-horizontal { 0% { transform: skewX(0deg); } 25% { transform: skewX(10deg); } 50% { transform: skewX(-10deg); } 75% { transform: skewX(5deg); } 100% { transform: skewX(0deg); } }

animations.name: Jelly Vertical
animations.css: .jelly-vertical { animation: jello-vertical 0.8s infinite ease-in-out; } @keyframes jello-vertical { 0% { transform: skewY(0deg); } 25% { transform: skewY(10deg); } 50% { transform: skewY(-10deg); } 75% { transform: skewY(5deg); } 100% { transform: skewY(0deg); } }

animations.name: Bounce Horizontal
animations.css: .bounce-horizontal { animation: bounce-horizontal 0.6s infinite ease-in-out; } @keyframes bounce-horizontal { 0% { transform: translateX(0); } 50% { transform: translateX(10px); } 100% { transform: translateX(0); } }

animations.name: Bounce Vertical
animations.css: .bounce-vertical { animation: bounce-vertical 0.6s infinite ease-in-out; } @keyframes bounce-vertical { 0% { transform: translateY(0); } 50% { transform: translateY(10px); } 100% { transform: translateY(0); } }

animations.name: Slide In Top
animations.css: .slide-in-top { animation: slideInTop 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInTop { 0% { transform: translateY(-100%); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In Bottom
animations.css: .slide-in-bottom { animation: slideInBottom 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInBottom { 0% { transform: translateY(100%); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In Left
animations.css: .slide-in-left { animation: slideInLeft 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInLeft { 0% { transform: translateX(-100%); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In Right
animations.css: .slide-in-right { animation: slideInRight 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInRight { 0% { transform: translateX(100%); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In Top Right
animations.css: .slide-in-top-right { animation: slideInTopRight 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes slideInTopRight { 0% { transform: translate(50px, -50px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In Bottom Right
animations.css: .slide-in-bottom-right { animation: slideInBottomRight 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes slideInBottomRight { 0% { transform: translate(50px, 50px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In Top Left
animations.css: .slide-in-top-left { animation: slideInTopLeft 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes slideInTopLeft { 0% { transform: translate(-50px, -50px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In Bottom Left
animations.css: .slide-in-bottom-left { animation: slideInBottomLeft 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes slideInBottomLeft { 0% { transform: translate(-50px, 50px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translate(0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In F Center
animations.css: .slide-in-forward-center { animation: slideInForwardCenter 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.25, 1, 0.5, 1) both; } @keyframes slideInForwardCenter { 0% { transform: scale(0.5) translate3d(0, 0, -100px); opacity: 0.5; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide In B Center
animations.css: .slide-in-backward-center { animation: slideInBackwardCenter 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.25, 1, 0.5, 1) both; } @keyframes slideInBackwardCenter { 0% { transform: scale(1.5) translate3d(0, 0, 100px); opacity: 0.5; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Scale In Center
animations.css: .scale-in-center { animation: scaleInCenter 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes scaleInCenter { 0% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Scale In Left
animations.css: .scale-in-left { animation: scaleInLeft 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes scaleInLeft { 0% { transform: scale(0) translateX(-100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Scale In Right
animations.css: .scale-in-right { animation: scaleInRight 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes scaleInRight { 0% { transform: scale(0.8) translateX(100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Scale In Horizontal
animations.css: .scale-in-horizontal-center { animation: scaleInHorizontalCenter 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes scaleInHorizontalCenter { 0% { transform: scaleX(0); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scaleX(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Scale In Vertical
animations.css: .scale-in-vertical-center { animation: scaleInVerticalCenter 0.6s cubic-bezier(0.25, 0.46, 0.45, 0.94) both; } @keyframes scaleInVerticalCenter { 0% { transform: scaleY(0); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scaleY(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Fade In
animations.css: .fade-in { animation: fade-in 1s ease-in-out forwards; } @keyframes fade-in { 0% { opacity: 0; } 100% { opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Fade In Top
animations.css: .fade-in-top { animation: fade-in-top 0.8s ease-in-out forwards; } @keyframes fade-in-top { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } }

animations.name: Fade In Left
animations.css: .fade-in-left { animation: fade-in-left 0.8s ease-in-out forwards; } @keyframes fade-in-left { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

animations.name: Fade In Right
animations.css: .fade-in-right { animation: fade-in-right 0.8s ease-in-out forwards; } @keyframes fade-in-right { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(20px); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } }

animations.name: Fade In Center
animations.css: .fade-in-center { animation: fade-in-center 0.8s ease-in-out forwards; } @keyframes fade-in-center { 0% { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.9); } 100% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1); } }

animations.name: Rotate In Left
animations.css: .rotate-in-left { animation: rotateInLeft 1s ease-in-out; } @keyframes rotateInLeft { 0% { transform: rotate(-90deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: rotate(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Rotate In Right
animations.css: .rotate-in-right { animation: rotateInRight 1s ease-in-out; } @keyframes rotateInRight { 0% { transform: rotate(90deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: rotate(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Rotate In Horizontal
animations.css: .rotate-in-horizontal { animation: rotateInHorizontal 1s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes rotateInHorizontal { 0% { transform: rotateX(-90deg); opacity: 0; filter: blur(4px); } 100% { transform: rotateX(0); opacity: 1; filter: blur(0); } }

animations.name: Rotate In Vertical
animations.css: .rotate-in-vertical { animation: rotateInVertical 1s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes rotateInVertical { 0% { transform: rotateY(-90deg); opacity: 0; filter: blur(4px); } 100% { transform: rotateY(0); opacity: 1; filter: blur(0); } }

animations.name: Swirl In Forward
animations.css: .swirl-in-forward { animation: swirlInForward 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes swirlInForward { 0% { transform: rotate(540deg) scale(0); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: rotate(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Swirl In Backward
animations.css: .swirl-in-backward { animation: swirlInBackward 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes swirlInBackward { 0% { transform: rotate(-540deg) scale(0); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: rotate(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Swirl In Left
animations.css: .swirl-in-left { animation: swirlInLeft 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes swirlInLeft { 0% { transform: rotate(-540deg) translateX(-100%) scale(0); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: rotate(0) translateX(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Swirl In Right
animations.css: .swirl-in-right { animation: swirlInRight 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes swirlInRight { 0% { transform: rotate(540deg) translateX(100%) scale(0); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: rotate(0) translateX(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Bounce In Forward
animations.css: .bounce-in-forward { animation: bounceInForward 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes bounceInForward { 0% { transform: scale(0.3) translateZ(-200px); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: scale(1.1) translateZ(20px); opacity: 1; } 70% {transform: scale(0.8) translateZ(-10px); opacity: 0.9;} 100% { transform: scale(1) translateZ(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Bounce In Backward
animations.css: .bounce-in-backward { animation: bounceInBackward 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes bounceInBackward { 0% { transform: scale(2.5) translateZ(200px); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: scale(0.8) translateZ(-20px); opacity: 1; } 70% {transform: scale(1.4) translateZ(10px); opacity:0.9;} 100% { transform: scale(1) translateZ(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Bounce In Left
animations.css: .bounce-in-left { animation: bounceInLeft 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes bounceInLeft { 0% { transform: translateX(-200px) scale(0.3); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: translateX(20px) scale(1.1); opacity: 1; } 70% {transform: translateX(-10px) scale(0.8); opacity:0.9;} 100% { transform: translateX(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Bounce In Right
animations.css: .bounce-in-right { animation: bounceInRight 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes bounceInRight { 0% { transform: translateX(200px) scale(0.3); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: translateX(-20px) scale(1.1); opacity: 1; } 70% {transform: translateX(10px) scale(0.8); opacity:0.9;} 100% { transform: translateX(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Bounce In Top
animations.css: .bounce-in-top { animation: bounceInTop 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes bounceInTop { 0% { transform: translateY(-200px) scale(0.3); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: translateY(20px) scale(1.1); opacity: 1; } 70% {transform: translateY(-10px) scale(0.8); opacity:0.9;} 100% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Bounce In Bottom
animations.css: .bounce-in-bottom { animation: bounceInBottom 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes bounceInBottom { 0% { transform: translateY(200px) scale(0.3); opacity: 0; } 50% { transform: translateY(-20px) scale(1.1); opacity: 1; } 70% {transform: translateY(10px) scale(0.8); opacity:0.9;} 100% { transform: translateY(0) scale(1); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Roll In Top
animations.css: .roll-in-top { animation: rollInTop 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes rollInTop { 0% { transform: translateY(-300px) rotate(-360deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Roll In Bottom
animations.css: .roll-in-bottom { animation: rollInBottom 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes rollInBottom { 0% { transform: translateY(300px) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Roll In Left
animations.css: .roll-in-left { animation: rollInLeft 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes rollInLeft { 0% { transform: translateX(-300px) rotate(-360deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Roll In Right
animations.css: .roll-in-right { animation: rollInRight 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes rollInRight { 0% { transform: translateX(300px) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Epileptic F Top
animations.css: .slide-in-forward-top { animation: slideInForwardTop 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInForwardTop { 0% { transform: scale(0.6) translate3d(0, -150px, -200px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Epileptic F Bottom
animations.css: .slide-in-forward-bottom { animation: slideInForwardBottom 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInForwardBottom { 0% { transform: scale(0.6) translate3d(0, 150px, -200px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Epileptic B Bottom
animations.css: .slide-in-backward-bottom { animation: slideInBackwardBottom 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInBackwardBottom { 0% { transform: scale(1.5) translate3d(0, 150px, 200px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Epileptic B Left
animations.css: .slide-in-backward-left { animation: slideInBackwardLeft 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInBackwardLeft { 0% { transform: scale(1.5) translate3d(-150px, 0, 200px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Epileptic F Left
animations.css: .slide-in-forward-left { animation: slideInForwardLeft 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInForwardLeft { 0% { transform: scale(0.6) translate3d(-150px, 0, -200px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Epileptic B Right
animations.css: .slide-in-backward-right { animation: slideInBackwardRight 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInBackwardRight { 0% { transform: scale(1.5) translate3d(150px, 0, 200px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Epileptic F Right
animations.css: .slide-in-forward-right { animation: slideInForwardRight 0.7s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes slideInForwardRight { 0% { transform: scale(0.6) translate3d(150px, 0, -200px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1) translate3d(0, 0, 0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Flicker On
animations.css: .flicker-on { animation: flickerOn 1s ease-in-out both; } @keyframes flickerOn { 0% { opacity: 0; } 10% { opacity: 0.4; } 20% { opacity: 0.2; } 30% { opacity: 0.8; } 40% { opacity: 0.3; } 50% { opacity: 1; } 60% { opacity: 0.5; } 70% { opacity: 0.9; } 80% { opacity: 0.6; } 90% { opacity: 1; } 100% { opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Slide Out Center
animations.css: .slide-out-center { animation: slideOutCenter 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes slideOutCenter { 0% { transform: translate(0, 0); opacity: 1; } 50% {transform: translate()} 100% { transform: translate(0, 0) scale(0); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Slide Out Top
animations.css: .slide-out-top { animation: slideOutTop 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes slideOutTop { 0% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateY(-30px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Slide Out Left
animations.css: .slide-out-left { animation: slideOutLeft 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes slideOutLeft { 0% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateX(-100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Slide Out Right
animations.css: .slide-out-right { animation: slideOutRight 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes slideOutRight { 0% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateX(100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Slide Out Bottom
animations.css: .slide-out-bottom { animation: slideOutBottom 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes slideOutBottom { 0% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateY(100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Scale Out Center
animations.css: .scale-out-center { animation: scaleOutCenter 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes scaleOutCenter { 0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(0); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Scale Out Top
animations.css: .scale-out-top { animation: scaleOutTop 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes scaleOutTop { 0% { transform: scale(1) translateY(0); opacity: 1; } 50% {transform:scale(1) translateY(-30px); opacity:1 } 100% { transform: scale(0) translateY(-100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Scale Out Left
animations.css: .scale-out-left { animation: scaleOutLeft 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes scaleOutLeft { 0% { transform: scale(1) translateX(0); opacity: 1; } 50% {transform:scale(1) translateX(-100px); opacity:1 } 100% { transform: scale(0) translateX(-100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Scale Out Right
animations.css: .scale-out-right { animation: scaleOutRight 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes scaleOutRight { 0% { transform: scale(1) translateX(0); opacity: 1; } 50% {transform:scale(1) translateX(100px); opacity:1 } 100% { transform: scale(0) translateX(100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Scale Out Bottom
animations.css: .scale-out-bottom { animation: scaleOutBottom 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes scaleOutBottom { 0% { transform: scale(1) translateY(0); opacity: 1; } 50% {transform:scale(1) translateY(100px); opacity:1 } 100% { transform: scale(0) translateY(100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Scale Out Vertical
animations.css: .scale-out-vertical { animation: scaleOutVertical 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes scaleOutVertical { 0% { transform: scale(1) scaleY(1); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(0) scaleY(0); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Scale Out Horizontal
animations.css: .scale-out-horizontal { animation: scaleOutHorizontal 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes scaleOutHorizontal { 0% { transform: scale(1) scaleX(1); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(0) scaleX(0); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Fade Out
animations.css: .fade-out { animation: fadeOut 2s ease-in-out; both} @keyframes fadeOut { 0% { opacity: 1; } 100% { opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Fade Out Top
animations.css: .fade-out-top { animation: fadeOutTop 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes fadeOutTop { 0% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } 100% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-50px); } }

animations.name: Fade Out Bottom
animations.css: .fade-out-bottom { animation: fadeOutBottom 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes fadeOutBottom { 0% { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } 100% { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(50px); } }

animations.name: Fade Out Left
animations.css: .fade-out-left { animation: fadeOutLeft 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes fadeOutLeft { 0% { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } 100% { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-50px); } }

animations.name: Fade Out Right
animations.css: .fade-out-right { animation: fadeOutRight 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes fadeOutRight { 0% { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } 100% { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(50px); } }

animations.name: Fade Out F
animations.css: .fade-out-forward { animation: fadeOutForward 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes fadeOutForward { 0% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1) translateZ(0); } 100% { opacity: 0; transform: scale(0.8) translateZ(50px); } }

animations.name: Fade Out B
animations.css: .fade-out-backward { animation: fadeOutBackward 0.7s ease-out both; } @keyframes fadeOutBackward { 0% { opacity: 1; transform: scale(1) translateZ(0); } 100% { opacity: 0; transform: scale(1.2) translateZ(-50px); } }

animations.name: Puff Out
animations.css: .puff-out-center { animation: puffOutCenter 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes puffOutCenter { 0% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; filter: blur(0px); } 100% { transform: scale(2); opacity: 0; filter: blur(10px); } }

animations.name: Bounce Out Top
animations.css: .bounce-out-top { animation: bounceOutTop 1s both; } @keyframes bounceOutTop { 0% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: translateY(-30px); opacity: 0.5; } 70% {transform: translateY(20px); opacity: 0.8;} 100% { transform: translateY(-30px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Bounce Out Bottom
animations.css: .bounce-out-bottom { animation: bounceOutBottom 1s both; } @keyframes bounceOutBottom { 0% { transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: translateY(30px); opacity: 0.5; } 70%{transform: translateY(-20px); opacity:0.8;} 100% { transform: translateY(100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Bounce Out Left
animations.css: .bounce-out-left { animation: bounceOutLeft 1s both; } @keyframes bounceOutLeft { 0% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: translateX(-30px); opacity: 0.5; } 70%{transform: translateX(20px); opacity:0.8;} 100% { transform: translateX(-100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Bounce Out Right
animations.css: .bounce-out-right { animation: bounceOutRight 1s both; } @keyframes bounceOutRight { 0% { transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: translateX(30px); opacity: 0.5; } 70%{ transform:translateX(-20px); opacity:0.8;} 100% { transform: translateX(100px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Roll Out Top
animations.css: .roll-out-top { animation: rollOutTop 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutTop { 0% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateY(-300px) rotate(-360deg); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Roll Out Bottom
animations.css: .roll-out-bottom { animation: rollOutBottom 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutBottom { 0% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateY(300px) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Roll Out Left
animations.css: .roll-out-left { animation: rollOutLeft 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutLeft { 0% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateX(-300px) rotate(-360deg); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Roll Out Right
animations.css: .roll-out-right { animation: rollOutRight 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutRight { 0% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: translateX(300px) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Roll Out Blurred Top
animations.css: .roll-out-blurred-top { animation: rollOutBlurredTop 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutBlurredTop { 0% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; filter: blur(0px); } 100% { transform: translateY(-300px) rotate(-360deg); opacity: 0; filter: blur(10px); } }

animations.name: Roll Out Blurred Bottom
animations.css: .roll-out-blurred-bottom { animation: rollOutBlurredBottom 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutBlurredBottom { 0% { transform: translateY(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; filter: blur(0px); } 100% { transform: translateY(300px) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; filter: blur(10px); } }

animations.name: Roll Out Blurred Left
animations.css: .roll-out-blurred-left { animation: rollOutBlurredLeft 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutBlurredLeft { 0% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; filter: blur(0px); } 100% { transform: translateX(-300px) rotate(-360deg); opacity: 0; filter: blur(10px); } }

animations.name: Roll Out Blurred Right
animations.css: .roll-out-blurred-right { animation: rollOutBlurredRight 0.6s ease-in both; } @keyframes rollOutBlurredRight { 0% { transform: translateX(0) rotate(0deg); opacity: 1; filter: blur(0px); } 100% { transform: translateX(300px) rotate(360deg); opacity: 0; filter: blur(10px); } }

animations.name: Flicker Out
animations.css: .flicker-out { animation: flickerOut 1s ease-out both; } @keyframes flickerOut { 0% { opacity: 1; } 20% { opacity: 0.4; } 40% { opacity: 0.8; } 60% { opacity: 0.2; } 80% { opacity: 0.6; } 100% { opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Expand
animations.css: .tracking-in-expand { animation: trackingInExpand 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInExpand { 0% { letter-spacing: -0.5em; opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Expand Top
animations.css: .tracking-in-expand-top { animation: trackingInExpandTop 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInExpandTop { 0% { letter-spacing: -0.5em; transform: translateY(-100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Expand Bottom
animations.css: .tracking-in-expand-bottom { animation: trackingInExpandBottom 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInExpandBottom { 0% { letter-spacing: -0.5em; transform: translateY(100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Expand Left
animations.css: .tracking-in-expand-left { animation: trackingInExpandLeft 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInExpandLeft { 0% { letter-spacing: -0.5em; transform: translateX(-100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Expand Right
animations.css: .tracking-in-expand-right { animation: trackingInExpandRight 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInExpandRight { 0% { letter-spacing: -0.5em; transform: translateX(100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Contract
animations.css: .tracking-in-contract { animation: trackingInContract 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInContract { 0% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Contract Top
animations.css: .tracking-in-contract-top { animation: trackingInContractTop 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInContractTop { 0% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; transform: translateY(-100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Contract Bottom
animations.css: .tracking-in-contract-bottom { animation: trackingInContractBottom 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInContractBottom { 0% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; transform: translateY(100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateY(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Contract Left
animations.css: .tracking-in-contract-left { animation: trackingInContractLeft 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInContractLeft { 0% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; transform: translateX(-100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking In Contract Right
animations.css: .tracking-in-contract-right { animation: trackingInContractRight 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingInContractRight { 0% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; transform: translateX(100px); opacity: 0; } 100% { letter-spacing: normal; transform: translateX(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Tracking Out
animations.css: .tracking-out { animation: trackingOut 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingOut { 0% { letter-spacing: normal; opacity: 1; } 100% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Tracking Out Top
animations.css: .tracking-out-top { animation: trackingOutTop 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingOutTop { 0% { letter-spacing: normal; opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } 100% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(-100px); } }

animations.name: Tracking Out Bottom
animations.css: .tracking-out-bottom { animation: trackingOutBottom 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingOutBottom { 0% { letter-spacing: normal; opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); } 100% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; opacity: 0; transform: translateY(100px); } }

animations.name: Tracking Out Left
animations.css: .tracking-out-left { animation: trackingOutLeft 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingOutLeft { 0% { letter-spacing: normal; opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } 100% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-100px); } }

animations.name: Tracking Out Right
animations.css: .tracking-out-right { animation: trackingOutRight 0.6s ease-out both; } @keyframes trackingOutRight { 0% { letter-spacing: normal; opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); } 100% { letter-spacing: 0.5em; opacity: 0; transform: translateX(100px); } }

animations.name: Focus In
animations.css: .focus-in-forward { animation: focus-in-forward 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes focus-in-forward { 0% { transform: translateZ(-200px); filter: blur(10px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: translateZ(0); filter: blur(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Focus In Expand
animations.css: .focus-in-expand { animation: focus-in-expand 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes focus-in-expand { 0% { transform: scale(0.5); filter: blur(10px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1); filter: blur(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Focus In Contract
animations.css: .focus-in-contract { animation: focus-in-contract 0.8s cubic-bezier(0.250, 0.460, 0.450, 0.940) both; } @keyframes focus-in-contract { 0% { transform: scale(1.5); filter: blur(10px); opacity: 0; } 100% { transform: scale(1); filter: blur(0); opacity: 1; } }

animations.name: Blur Out
animations.css: .blur-out { animation: blur-out 1s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes blur-out { 0% { filter: blur(0px); opacity: 1; } 100% { filter: blur(10px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Blur Out Contract
animations.css: .blur-out-contract { animation: blur-out-contract 1s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes blur-out-contract { 0% { transform: scale(1); filter: blur(0px); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(0.8); filter: blur(10px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Blur Out Expand
animations.css: .blur-out-expand { animation: blur-out-expand 1s cubic-bezier(0.550, 0.085, 0.680, 0.530) both; } @keyframes blur-out-expand { 0% { transform: scale(1); filter: blur(0px); opacity: 1; } 100% { transform: scale(1.2); filter: blur(10px); opacity: 0; } }

animations.name: Wave Background
animations.css: .bg-wave { background: linear-gradient(45deg, #ff00ff, #0000ff); padding:200px; animation: waveMove 3s infinite alternate; } @keyframes waveMove { 0% { background-position: left; } 100% { background-position: right; } }
